mapper.select: select pa.id, pa.project_id, pa.district,a.dict_label as district_name, pa.street, b.dict_label as street_name, pa.community, c.dict_label as community_name, pa.hamlet, d.dict_label as hamlet_name from project_area pa left join sys_dict_data a on pa.district = a.dict_value and a.dict_type='district' left join sys_dict_data b on pa.street = b.dict_value and b.dict_type='street' left join sys_dict_data c on pa.community = c.dict_value and c.dict_type='community' left join sys_dict_data d on pa.hamlet = d.dict_value and d.dict_type='hamlet' where pa.project_id = #{projectId}
